pr_title: Issue #1542: Support several contextual preferences at the same level

timeline.message: Issue #1542: Support several contextual preferences at the same level if all of them has the same value.

timeline.bodyText: We can get rid of MessageConstants.WARN_CONTEXTUAL_PREFERENCE_REDUCER_NOT_FOUND now.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.message: Issue #1542: Support several contextual preferences at the same level if all of them has the same value - clean up
